description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to Tom Brady joining the Bucs in free agency. The guys discuss how this deal happened and why it makes sense for Tampa Bay, before exploring the on-field outlook for Brady and the Bucs next season.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
